markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Retaliatory Cleansing](/Feats.aspx?ID=3636) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 84

**Frequency**
You're holding   holy water   or a bomb that deals positive damage in one of your hands.

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

**Trigger**
You would take damage from an adjacent creature's Strike.

</column>

---

You twist your hand in front of the blow, ensuring the enemy's attack shatters the required _holy water_ or bomb. The creature takes the on-hit and [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage from the _holy water_ or required bomb, not counting any additional effects you would add or apply when you throw the bomb, such as weapon specialization or [Calculated Splash](/Feats.aspx?ID=99). You're splashed by the _holy water_ or required bomb, although since positive damage harms only [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) and creatures with [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), it's unlikely you will take damage.
